title: The While Loop
subtitle: Condition-Based Looping
description:
# While Loops: Loop Until Condition Changes

## What is a While Loop?

While loops repeat WHILE a condition is true:

```gdscript
var health = 100

while health > 0:
    print("Still alive! Health: ", health)
    health -= 20
print("Game Over!")
```

## While vs For

**For Loop:** Use when you know how many times to repeat
**While Loop:** Use when you repeat until something happens

## Be Careful!

⚠️ Make sure the condition eventually becomes false, or you'll get an infinite loop!

```gdscript
# INFINITE LOOP - BAD!
var x = 0
while x < 10:
    print(x)  # x never changes!

# GOOD - x changes
var x = 0
while x < 10:
    print(x)
    x += 1  # Now it will end!
```

## Your Quest

Create game systems using while loops.

# 1. Health regeneration - heal 10 HP per turn until full (max 100)

solutionCode:
# While Loop Challenges

# 1. Health regeneration
var health = 50
var max_health = 100
print("Regenerating health...")
while health < max_health:
    health += 10
    print("Health: ", health)
print("Fully healed!\n")

# 2. Gold collection
var gold = 0
print("Collecting gold...")
while gold < 200:
    gold += 25
    print("Gold: ", gold)
print("Goal reached!\n")

# 3. Enemy spawn
var enemy_count = 0
print("Spawning enemies...")
while enemy_count < 5:
    enemy_count += 1
    print("Enemy ", enemy_count, " spawned!")
print("Wave complete!")
hints: Check condition at start of while
Update the variable inside the loop!
Make sure the condition eventually becomes false
Print progress to see what's happening
